# footer

**Instance Property**

A localized string that provides additional information for the group of options.

## Declaration

```swift
var footer: String { get set }
```

## Accessing options group attributes

- **identifier**: A unique identifier.
- **options**: An array of collaboration options the system displays as a group.
- **title**: A localized string the system displays as the title of the group section.

items.description: An array of collaboration options the system displays as a group.
items.name: options

items.description: A localized string the system displays as the title of the group section.
items.name: title
